3a7b8b1acac5e6e919b0314f38b69d642b7f5a2fd6ab1e32af1a76f9f","license":"BUSL-1.1","urls":["bzz-raw://467c7e47fae8c58a4841250a8cc340b8976a9114c94f5bfc6b6e10c837f69175","dweb:/ipfs/QmPFpKMNsb4GCb8RDJ7AE9T4QXXSBX6y6jKctWk2iUF2Fg"]}},"version":1}

canCall(address,bytes4).details: Returns true if:      - User has DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE (role 0), OR      - Function has no role requirements (functionRoles == 0), OR      - User has at least one of the required roles

params.user: The address to check permissions for

returns._0: bool True if user is authorized to call the function

functionRoles(bytes4).details: Returns a bytes32 bit-flag where each bit represents a required role      If returns 0, anyone can call the function

returns._0: bytes32 The function's required role bit-flags

hasRole(address,uint8).details: Checks if the specified role bit is set in user's role flags

params.role: The role ID (0-255) to check for

returns._0: bool True if user has the specified role

setFunctionAccess(bytes4,uint8,bool).details: Associates a role requirement with a specific function selector      Only users with the specified role (or admin) can call the function

params.enabled: True to require this role, false to remove requirement
params.role: The role ID (0-255) required to call this function

setUserRole(address,uint8,bool).details: Updates the user's role bit-flags      Role 0 (DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE) grants access to all functions

params.enabled: True to grant the role, false to revoke it
params.role: The role ID (0-255) to grant or revoke
params.user: The address to grant/revoke role for

userRoles(address).details: Returns a bytes32 bit-flag where each bit represents a role (0-255)      Bit N set to 1 means user has role N

canCall(address,bytes4).notice: Check if a user can call a specific function

functionRoles(bytes4).notice: Get required roles for a function

hasRole(address,uint8).notice: Check if a user has a specific role

setUserRole(address,uint8,bool).notice: Grant or revoke a role from a user

userRoles(address).notice: Get all roles assigned to a user
